messages.subject: Re: Eclipse
messages.msgSnippet: We did the mask around the binoculars thing and projected it onto a wall.  It was very cool, but unfortunaley we forgot the camera at home.  BUMMER!  Well it
messages.messageBody:
We did the mask around the binoculars thing and projected it onto a
wall. It was very cool, but unfortunaley we forgot the camera at
home. BUMMER! Well it was a great experience anyway:)

Tammy

>

> >
> > The eclipse is happening right now here in Davis, Ca. We are home
with sick

looked on my
> > floor and we had a hundred big images of the solar eclipse right
on the
> > rug.
> > The sun was filtered by the grape leaves on the arbor. My image
to verify
> > that yes this was the eclipse was about 100th the size of the
ones on the
> > floor. Very cool. My son had images on his legs.
> >
> > Mary
>
> COOL! Now tell me you had film in the camera? You took pictures,
right? ;o)
> ~Nancy~ Praying the ones I took tonight at the ball diamond come
out!
>

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Eclipse
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/10/02 7:59:16 PM Central Daylight Time, ... COOL! Now tell me you had film in the camera? You took pictures, right? ;o) ~Nancy~ Praying
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/10/02 7:59:16 PM Central Daylight Time,
mfhick@... writes:


> Hello,
>
> The eclipse is happening right now here in Davis, Ca. We are home with sick
> kids. As I searched the web for ways to view the eclipse, I looked on my
> floor and we had a hundred big images of the solar eclipse right on the
> rug.
> The sun was filtered by the grape leaves on the arbor. My image to verify
> that yes this was the eclipse was about 100th the size of the ones on the
> floor. Very cool. My son had images on his legs.
>
> Mary

COOL! Now tell me you had film in the camera? You took pictures, right? ;o)
~Nancy~ Praying the ones I took tonight at the ball diamond come out!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Eclipse
messages.msgSnippet: How cool, we drove about thirty minutes to lake Michigan to get a look, by the time we got there the clouds moved in and the temp dropped to 69 from 83 at
messages.messageBody:
How cool, we drove about thirty minutes to lake Michigan to get a look, by
the time we got there the clouds moved in and the temp dropped to 69 from 83
at home. Needless to say we had to head back without seeing a thing.

Dorothy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Eclipse
messages.msgSnippet: We had nothing but clouds in southwest missouri ... ===== If God meant for us to go around naked we would be born that way!
messages.messageBody:
We had nothing but clouds in southwest missouri

messages.subject: Eclipse
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, The eclipse is happening right now here in Davis, Ca. We are home with sick kids. As I searched the web for ways to view the eclipse, I looked on my
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

The eclipse is happening right now here in Davis, Ca. We are home with sick
kids. As I searched the web for ways to view the eclipse, I looked on my
floor and we had a hundred big images of the solar eclipse right on the rug.
The sun was filtered by the grape leaves on the arbor. My image to verify
that yes this was the eclipse was about 100th the size of the ones on the
floor. Very cool. My son had images on his legs.

Mary
